description: This file contains a React component for handling the OAuth callback process with Confluence, including displaying status messages and redirecting users accordingly.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: A React component wrapping the inner OAuth callback logic within a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Handles the processing of OAuth parameters, manages success/error states, and performs user redirects.
